casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Larry IVEY. No. 614P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of December 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
